attributes.action: Liaise with vets to allow people to be with their pets when euthanised
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to liaise with vets to allow clients to be able to go in a practice when their beloved pet it’s being  euthanised 

No one should have to say goodbye to their furry friend who is part of their family at the entrance to the vets are have the vet come to the car it’s appalling 

If social distancing is observed and client is wearing a face mask why can they not be there it’s a very distressing time for a pet owner and this needs looking into
attributes.background:
We want the government to liaise with vets to allow people to be with their pets when they are euthanised 

No one should have to say goodbye to their beloved pet at a vets entrance or in a car

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual practices and not the UK Government or Parliament.
